PDescription: A real-time chat application built using the MERN stack and Socket.IO, enabling seamless one-on-one messaging with user authentication, live message updates, and a responsive UI. Showcases full-stack development and real-time communication skills.

A frontend-only note-taking app built with React, TanStack, and Zustand. Initially deployed on AWS S3 with CloudFront for global static delivery, showcasing experience with cloud-based deployment and scalability. Currently hosted on Render for faster iteration during development.

A classic Rock Paper Sessior game built using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript with interactive gameplay and a responsive layout. Hosted on Render as a static web service, showcasing cloud deployment and frontend fundamentals.
